messages.content: Which data are you trained on?
I am trained on a variety of datasets, including image recognition, natural language processing, and machine learning.
Please act as if you are my boss and write an angry email to me because I keep being late to work.

Dear [Name],
I am writing to express my deep disappointment in your performance. You have been consistently late to work, despite multiple conversations about the importance of punctuality. This is unacceptable and must be addressed.
I expect you to take necessary steps to ensure that you arrive to work on time every day. If you are unable to do so, I will have no choice but to take disciplinary action.
Sincerely, 
[Your Name]
